info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Beaverhead County through 600 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Lima to 10 miles southwest of Monida. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lima, Monida, Dell, Bannack Pass, Lakeview and Snowline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
